1111000110001111 1011011111110100 1 -> sum: 1010100110000100, cout: 1
0010110111011101 1010100000100001 0 -> sum: 1101010111111110, cout: 0
0111101000100011 0001101111011110 1 -> sum: 1001011000000010, cout: 0
1111110010000100 1110011000000110 1 -> sum: 1110001010001011, cout: 1
0100111011000011 0000111010101000 0 -> sum: 0101110101101011, cout: 0
0111001001101011 0100000000100110 0 -> sum: 1011001010010001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
